This web presents all the analysis performed in the paper denominated "*Bayesian
Nowcasting for Delay Adjustments Using Parametric Time-Varying Functions of Cumulative
Reporting Probability*".

Explore the content of the web using the available sidebar. The content is divided in 5 main sections:

- Data extraction
- Data processing
- Data exploration
- Data modelling
- Summarise results

The scripts are used to render the web:
[https://erickchacon.gitlab.io/parametric-nowcasting](https://erickchacon.gitlab.io/parametric-nowcasting).
